name: Difficulty
description: The pet is easy to take care of and does not require much knowledge to begin with

name: Everyday cost
description: The pet is cheap to take care,  i.e. its food does not cost much

name: Initial cost
description: The initial cost of the pet and all of its necessities is low

name: Time
description: The pet does not require a lot of time

name: Space
description: The pet does not require a lot of open space

name: Is active
description: The pet does not require a lot of activity
